pr_title: Dynamic config schema validation; Read resources from jar

timeline.bodyText: I think we can remove this function and also readConfigFile (see later comment).
timeline.author: aklish

timeline.bodyText:
I feel like this is the best place to construct the spring resource URL with either file:// or resource://.
this.configDir value could actually be a URL containing file:// or resource:// and then used for loading security, variables, and tables (all using spring resource loader).
timeline.author: aklish

timeline.bodyText: Should forward slash here also be File.separator?
